Beginning of each round a random amount of circles (2-5) will be generated which will be shown for 1 second before turning to a blank screen.

Now it\'s your turn to play, you\'ll have to try your best to touch the positions where the circles were. Each correct tap on the circle will earn you 1 point. A result screen will be shown at the end of each round, you can take your time and tap anywhere to continue to the next round.
As the default game, 2 players can play in turns. Game duration can be set in the settings, whoever has more points in the end wins.
You can practice alone in the Training, the amount of circles will increase each round until 5, and then it will be random.
Pressure mode can be chosen if you find the original mode too easy. You will need to calibrate the minimum and maximum pressures due to the different limits of sensors on devices.
Each circle will be shown in Green or Yellow or Red representing the pressure you must tap on it (Low, Medium, High pressure). With a correct pressure pressed, you will gain an additional point.
